title: Lynmouth
provenance_text:
Peter Lanyon [1918-1964], St Ives, Cornwall, England; Gimpel Fils, London, England [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 256) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent to the exhibition by Gimpel Fils.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on December 17, 1958. Gimpel FIls acknowledged receipt of the payment on January 22, 1959.
